content:
I am a research assistant at National Tsing Hua University supervised by Prof. Min Sun. After taking CS61A, CS70 at U.C. Berkeley; ML Foundations, ML Techniques by Prof. Hsuan-Tien Lin at National Taiwan University; several on-line/open courses on the internet (deeplearning.ai, cs231n, etc.) and a research intern at an AI startup, I found my passion in Computer Science and decided to pursue Ph.D./M.S in CS to consolidate my research career. Previously, I was pleasure to have the opportunity to work with Prof. Hwann-Tzong Chen at National Tsing Hua University.
See my CV (last updated July 2019) for more details.
